tool_description: Dirt bike, ATV, SxS, Jeep, and Snowmobile parks and trails. braapDB is made by riders, for riders. The vast collection of crowdsourced data is constantly evolving thanks to you. Get your free account and API key at http://www.braapDB.com
name: braapDB
title: braapDB

api_list.name: Update Park
Update Experience Level
Add A New Park
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://brappdbv2.p.rapidapi.com/Park"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brappdbv2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://brappdbv2.p.rapidapi.com/Park/30/RideReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brappdbv2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://brappdbv2.p.rapidapi.com/Park/{id}/RideReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brappdbv2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
